bike.description: Alpha Red Aluminum w/internally and externally relieved head tube, hydroformed bi-axial down tube and top tube, wishbone seatstay, hydroformed chainstays, asymmetric seat tube, forged horizontally adjustable disc dropouts

components.description: Bontrager sealed hubs; Bontrager Duster rims, 29" front, 26" rear
Bontrager Race Lite Big Sweep, 31.8mm, 640mm width
Avid Elixir R, hydraulic disc; 185mm front rotor, 160mm rear rotor
